movies.title: Avengers : Infinity War
movies.synopsis: First part of the end of the third phase of MCU

movies.title: Conjuring: The Beyond
movies.synopsis: The trashest part of conjuring series

movies.title: Grown Ups
movies.synopsis: Adam sandler strikes again with comedy

movies.title: Captain America: The First Avenger
movies.synopsis: Steve Rogers, a rejected military soldier, transforms into Captain America after taking a dose of a Super-Soldier serum. But being Captain America comes at a price as he attempts to take down a warmonger and a terrorist organization

movies.title: Captain America: The Winter Soldier
movies.synopsis: As Steve Rogers struggles to embrace his role in the modern world, he teams up with a fellow Avenger and S.H.I.E.L.D agent, Black Widow, to battle a new threat from history: an assassin known as the Winter Soldier.

movies.title: Iron Man
movies.synopsis: After being held captive in an Afghan cave, billionaire engineer Tony Stark creates a unique weaponized suit of armor to fight evil

movies.title: The Avengers
movies.synopsis: Earth's mightiest heroes must come together and learn to fight as a team if they are going to stop the mischievous Loki and his alien army from enslaving humanity

movies.title: Iron Man 3
movies.synopsis: When Tony Stark's world is torn apart by a formidable terrorist called the Mandarin, he starts an odyssey of rebuilding and retribution

movies.title: Iron Man 2
movies.synopsis: With the world now aware of his identity as Iron Man, Tony Stark must contend with both his declining health and a vengeful mad man with ties to his father's legacy

movies.title: Captain America: Civil War
movies.synopsis: Political involvement in the Avengers' affairs causes a rift between Captain America and Iron Man

movies.title: Avengers: Age of Ultron
movies.synopsis: When Tony Stark and Bruce Banner try to jump-start a dormant peacekeeping program called Ultron, things go horribly wrong and it's up to Earth's mightiest heroes to stop the villainous Ultron from enacting his terrible plan

movies.title: Thor
movies.synopsis: The powerful but arrogant god Thor is cast out of Asgard to live amongst humans in Midgard (Earth), where he soon becomes one of their finest defenders

movies.title: Guardians of the Galaxy
movies.synopsis: A group of intergalactic criminals must pull together to stop a fanatical warrior with plans to purge the universe.

movies.title: Thor: Ragnarok
movies.synopsis: Imprisoned on the planet Sakaar, Thor must race against time to return to Asgard and stop Ragnar√∂k, the destruction of his world, at the hands of the powerful and ruthless villain Hela.

movies.title: Doctor Strange
movies.synopsis: While on a journey of physical and spiritual healing, a brilliant neurosurgeon is drawn into the world of the mystic arts

movies.title: Thor: The Dark World
movies.synopsis: When the Dark Elves attempt to plunge the universe into darkness, Thor must embark on a perilous and personal journey that will reunite him with doctor Jane Foster

movies.title: Spider-Man: Homecoming
movies.synopsis: Peter Parker balances his life as an ordinary high school student in Queens with his superhero alter-ego Spider-Man, and finds himself on the trail of a new menace prowling the skies of New York City

movies.title: Spider-Man: No Way Home
movies.synopsis: Adam sandler strikes again with comedy

movies.title: Spider-Man
movies.synopsis: After being bitten by a genetically-modified spider, a shy teenager gains spider-like abilities that he uses to fight injustice as a masked superhero and face a vengeful enemy

movies.title: Zack Snyder's Justice League
movies.synopsis: Determined to ensure that Superman's ultimate sacrifice wasn't in vain, Bruce Wayne recruits a team of metahumans to protect the world from an approaching threat of catastrophic proportions

movies.title: Shazam!
movies.synopsis: A newly fostered young boy in search of his mother instead finds unexpected super powers and soon gains a powerful enemy.
